analyzed: iddhaḥ manaḥ tassa yathā api mayha
cittam pi jānāhi tathā iva deva
iddhaḥ manaḥ tassa yathā api tuyha
bhavam nu cittaḥ suta maññataḥ te
gāthā su gītā na mamatthi kaṅkhā
dadāmi te gām avaram satam ca
na ca aham cittaḥ suta maññataḥ me
api te varam atta manaḥ dadeyya
su laddha lābhaḥ vata me ahosi

original: Na patthaye putta pasuṁ dhanaṁ vā.
analyzed: na patthaye putta pasum dhanam vā
addhā hi saccam vacanam tava ita

original: Yathāpi mātā ca pitā ca puttaṁ,
analyzed: yathā api mātā ca pitā ca putta
evam pi mam tvam anusāsa bhante
adhamma kāro tava mā āhu raṭṭhe

original: Sace ca taṁ rāja mado saheyya,
analyzed: sace ca tam rāja mado saheyya
